properties.entry: SELECT G.GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') "RELEASE_DATE" , PRICE , POINT , GAME_STATUS , (FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME) "GAME_IMG" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.MEM_NO= ? AND G.GAME_NO =W.GAME_NO ) AS count FROM GAME G JOIN UPLOAD_FILE U ON (G.GAME_NO = U.REF_BNO) WHERE UPPER(KOR_NAME || ENG_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') AND CONFIRM = 'Y' AND FILE_TYPE = 1

SELECT GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') "RELEASE_DATE" , PRICE , GAME_INTRO , CONFIRM , UPGAME , UPLOAD_DATE , POINT , GAME_STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.MEM_NO= ? AND G.GAME_NO =W.GAME_NO ) AS count FROM GAME G WHERE GAME_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , GAME_NO , MEM_NO , CONTENTS , STAR_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT REVIEW_NO , GAME_NO , MEM_NICK "WRITER" , CONTENTS , RECOMMEND , TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "UPLOAD_DATE" , STAR_NO , MEM_NO FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND GAME_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT G.GAME_NO "GAME_NO" , C.COMPANY_NAME "COMPANY_NAME" , G.ENG_NAME "ENG_NAME" , TO_CHAR(G.UPLOAD_DATE, '""YYYY"-"MM"-"DD""') "UPLOAD_DATE" , G.CONFIRM "CONFIRM" , G.GAME_STATUS "GAME_STATUS" FROM GAME G INNER JOIN COMPANY C ON G.COMPANY_NO = C.COMPANY_NO
ORDER BY G.GAME_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM GAME WHERE GAME_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C ,GAME_CATEGORY GC WHERE GC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND GC.GAME_NO = ?
SELECT GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , PRICE , UPLOAD_DATE , CONFIRM , UPGAME FROM GAME WHERE COMPANY_NO = ?

INSERT INTO GAME ( GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , RELEASE_DATE , PRICE , GAME_INTRO , UPLOAD_DATE , GAME_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_GAME_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(?), 'YYYY-MM-DD') , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT INTO UPLOAD_FILE ( FILE_NO , GAME_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , FILE_PATH , FILE_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_UP_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_GAME_NO.CURRVAL , SEQ_GAME_NO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_TYPE FROM UPLOAD_FILE WHERE GAME_NO = ? AND FILE_TYPE = 1
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_TYPE FROM UPLOAD_FILE WHERE GAME_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_TYPE
UPDATE GAME SET KOR_NAME =? , ENG_NAME =? , GAME_INTRO = ? , PRICE = ? WHERE GAME_NO = ?
UPDATE UPLOAD_FILE SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO UPLOAD_FILE ( FILE_NO , GAME_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , FILE_PATH , FILE_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_UP_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )

SELECT GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') "RELEASE_DATE" , PRICE , GAME_INTRO , CONFIRM , UPGAME , UPLOAD_DATE , POINT , GAME_STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST W WHERE G.GAME_NO =W.GAME_NO ) AS count FROM GAME G WHERE GAME_NO = ?
SELECT ROUND(CEIL(AVG(STAR_NO)),-1) "STAR_AVG" FROM REVIEW WHERE GAME_NO = ?
INSERT INTO GAME_CATEGORY VALUES ( SEQ_GAME_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
UPDATE GAME SET CONFIRM =? WHERE GAME_NO = ?
UPDATE GAME SET GAME_STATUS = 'N' WHERE GAME_NO = ?

SELECT GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , PRICE , CONFIRM , UPGAME , UPLOAD_DATE , POINT , GAME_IMG FROM (SELECT GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , PRICE , CONFIRM , UPGAME , UPLOAD_DATE , POINT , GAME_IMG FROM GAME WHERE CONFIRM = 'Y' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
